https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/orkgsSlBNuLOGTyWJCpXhXZOtwX.jpg When hard-as-nails demon hunter Ramona (Tonya L. Harris) uncovers the Devil's plot to scorch the Earth, she enlists the murderous talents of long-retired demon-hunter Lady Jasmine (Brinke Stevens) and the infamous Lady Black (Tiffany Shepis). Together, these three ladies will wage a hellish war against evil that will show the Devil what Hell really is! Bleed 4 Me
